overview: Su-Ling’s illicit sex studio has never been hotter… Under the disguise of a luxury island inn, the brothel has men lining up in droves to indulge themselves in lots of horny action with her harem of beautiful girls! But when the Pimp Daddy learns that the Madam is stashing cash away, he is quick to investigate what precisely she has hiding under her bra and wet panties…
title: Sex Studio
